constituent: bear, ability, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, spoon, sitting on the ground, oven-fire, barbecue, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
koohiiStory1: Most don´t know it, but bears have the ability to walk on fire. They´re invincible creatures!
koohiiStory2: Note : I don´t know why James Heisig put "bear" ahead of "ability" (next frame), but I sugget to skip this, learn the next kanji ("ability") then go back here and use ability as a primitive.
